original: Zachau, Frank Hjalmar, om’budsman, Uddevalla, f. 22/9/00 i Uddevalla av kass. Hjalmiar Z. o. Gerda Swanberg. G. 35 m. Greta Tideström. Barn: Eva f. 38, Per Erik 40, Karin 43. — Stud:-ex. i Uddevalla 19, jur. kand. i Upps. 26. Tingstjg. i Vartofta o. Frökinds doms. 27-29, bitr. h. adv. i Gbg o. Uddevalla 30-31, eg. adv :byrå i Uddevalla sed. 32, auditör v. Bohusl. reg. sed. 35, v. krigsdom. där sed. 37 o. v. Skarab. flygflottilj, ersätt, f. överför-mynd. i Uddevalla. Led. av Sv:es ad-v:samf. 36-46. Ombudsman lios Thor-dénföretagen i Uddevalla sed. 46. RVOlkl.
translated: Zachau, Frank Hjalmar, ombudsman, Uddevalla, born on September 22, 1900 in Uddevalla as the child of cashier Hjalmar Z. and Gerda Swanberg. Married in 1935 to Greta Tideström. Children: Eva born in 1938, Per Erik in 1940, Karin in 1943. Completed secondary education in Uddevalla in 1919, obtained a law degree in Uppsala in 1926. Worked as a clerk in Vartofta and Frökinds District Courts from 1927 to 1929, assistant attorney in Gothenburg and Uddevalla from 1930 to 1931, established his own law firm in Uddevalla in 1932, appointed as auditor for the Bohuslän Regiment in 1935, served as a military judge in Uddevalla from 1937 and in the Skaraborg Air Force Wing, later appointed deputy over-judge. Member of the Swedish Advocacy Society from 1936 to 1946. Ombudsman at the Thordén Enterprises in Uddevalla since 1946. Awarded the Order of Vasa (Knight's Cross) in ...
